name: Change Password-Mismatched new password
statusMessage: Status code is 400, Response body has property 'detail', Status code response is Bad Request , Verify the error message in the response

testStage.statusMessage: Status code is 400, Response body has property 'detail', Status code response is Bad Request , Verify the error message in the response

steps.name: Status code is 400
steps.statusMessage: expected response to have status code 400 but got 403
steps.statusTrace:
AssertionError: expected response to have status code 400 but got 403
   at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:1:34)

steps.name: Response body has property 'detail'
steps.statusTrace:
AssertionError: expected { …(2) } to have property 'detail'
   at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:2:34)

steps.name: Status code response is Bad Request
steps.statusMessage: expected response to have status reason 'Bad Request' but got 'Forbidden'
steps.statusTrace:
AssertionError: expected response to have status reason 'Bad Request' but got 'Forbidden'
   at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:3:34)

steps.name: Verify the error message in the response
steps.statusMessage: expected undefined to deeply equal 'Password not the same'
steps.statusTrace:
AssertionError: expected undefined to deeply equal 'Password not the same'
   at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:4:34)
